844220.name: Changeover: Decisions - Original Soundtrack
844220.description:
This DLC contains the full versions of all the soundtracks from "Changeover: Decisions" created for you by "Jean" group, Dmitry Fedotov and others. You can easily play it by Steam Music Player. You can also find the MP3 versions in your game folder.

Track list (14 total):
1. Decisions by Dmitry Fedotov
2. New Spring by Jean
3. March by Jean
4. Fall Down by Jean
5. Adieu by Jean
6. Jean Ty by Jean
7. Exploration by Dmitry Fedotov
8. Sad Sunset by Dmitry Fedotov
9. Impending Threat by Jack Midkiff
10. Expectation by Dmitry Fedotov
11. Unexpected Meeting by Dmitry Fedotov
12. Dark Descent by Matthew Pablo
13. Unconsciousness by Dmitry Fedotov
14. Underground Lab by Dmitry Fedotov

Buying the DLC you support the developer
